hero.title: Full Stack Developer & Creative Problem Solver
hero.description: Passionate about building innovative web applications, exploring algorithms, and creating interactive experiences with modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.text: I'm a passionate developer who loves exploring the intersection of technology and creativity. My journey includes building web applications, visualizing algorithms, creating games, and experimenting with cutting-edge web technologies like WebGL and WebAssembly.

items.title: Algorithm Visualizations
items.description: Interactive visualizations of sorting algorithms including Bubble Sort and Merge Sort, built with WebAssembly for optimal performance.

items.title: Pong Game
items.description: Classic Pong game implementation using Raylib compiled to WebAssembly, demonstrating game development in the browser.

items.title: WebGL Exploration
items.description: Interactive 3D graphics experiments using WebGL, exploring the capabilities of GPU-accelerated rendering in the browser.

items.title: Canvas Tools
items.description: Creative coding tools and utilities for canvas manipulation, including position tracking and interactive elements.

items.title: Public Chat Room
items.description: Real-time peer-to-peer chat application using PeerJS for decentralized communication. No server required - just pure browser-to-browser messaging.

items.title: Skill Tracker
items.description: Interactive skill tracking and learning platform for tracking progress across multiple skills. Features include progress overview dashboard, decision tree builder, DSRP framework analysis tool, Six Thinking Hat methodology, and customizable themes. Supports multiple programming languages and provides visual tools for learning and decision-making.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to collaborate.
